name: Parallel Pits
description:
Hill and Billy go exploring in a cave when they suddenly get separated. Navigate the cave and help each other using buttons and doors to get the the next room.

CONTROLS

MOVEMENT

A and D or Left and Right

JUMP

W, Up, or Space

I MADE A VIDEO ON THIS GAME!

Check out Mango's devlog!
